Header.title: Mimosa International
Header.paragraph: Welcome to our consultancy in New Baneshwor, Kathmandu. We specialize in study abroad assistance and offer NAT & JLPT classes for language proficiency exams.

About.paragraph: Welcome to our consultancy, located in the heart of Kathmandu, Nepal, near Eyeplex Complex in New Baneshwor. Our consultancy specializes in providing assistance to individuals seeking to study abroad, as well as offering NAT and JLPT classes to help prepare students for language proficiency exams. We understand the challenges that come with studying abroad and we strive to make the process as smooth as possible for our clients.

Services.name: Study Abroad Assistance
Services.text: We provide comprehensive guidance to students who wish to study abroad. From selecting the right program to assisting with the visa application process, we offer personalized services to help our clients achieve their educational goals.

Services.name: NAT & JLPT Classes
Services.text: We offer classes to prepare students for the NAT and JLPT language proficiency exams. Our classes are designed to provide a thorough understanding of the exam format, as well as develop skills in reading, writing, listening and speaking.

Services.name: Career Counseling
Services.text: We also offer career counseling to individuals who are unsure about their career path or need assistance with job search strategies. Our team of career experts has extensive knowledge of various industries and can provide guidance on developing a strong resume, networking, and preparing for job interviews.

Contact.address: New Baneshwor ( Near Eyeplex Complex) , Kathmandu, Nepal

Features.title: Expert Guidance
Features.text: Our experienced professionals provide expert guidance to help clients achieve their goals.

Features.title: Personalized Services
Features.text: We offer personalized services tailored to meet the unique needs of each client, ensuring a smooth and stress-free experience.

Features.title: Convenient Location
Features.text: Our consultancy is located in the heart of Kathmandu, making it easily accessible for clients who need our services.

Features.title: Client Satisfaction
Features.text: We prioritize client satisfaction and work tirelessly to ensure that our clients receive the highest level of service and support.
